metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0488 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting with version 8.10. It was possible to trigger a timeout on a pagewith markdown by using a specific amount of block-quotes.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
